title: Alcohol dependence, psychiatric disorders share genetic links

title_detail.value: Alcohol dependence, psychiatric disorders share genetic links

summary: An international team of researchers has identified a gene that regulates how quickly the body metabolizes alcohol as a key risk factor for alcohol dependence. The researchers also linked genetic factors associated with alcohol dependence to other psychiatric disorders.
